concise_definition: v. 合作, 协作, 配合

definitions.explanation_en: To work together with others toward a common goal, often by sharing resources, information, or efforts in a mutually beneficial way.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指与他人共同协作，朝着共同目标努力，通常通过共享资源、信息或努力实现互利。
definitions.example_en: The two companies are cooperating on a new environmental initiative.
definitions.example_cn: 这两家公司正在合作开展一项新的环保计划。

definitions.explanation_en: To comply with or assist in a request, rule, or system, especially when it requires willingness to participate or yield personal preference.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指愿意遵从、协助某项请求、规则或体系，尤其当这需要放弃个人偏好或主动配合时。
definitions.example_en: He was cooperating with the police during the investigation.
definitions.example_cn: 他在调查期间积极配合警方。

definitions.explanation_en: To act in harmony or alignment with another party, even without formal agreement, to achieve smoother outcomes or avoid conflict.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指即使没有正式协议，也与另一方保持协调一致，以实现更顺畅的结果或避免冲突。
definitions.example_en: The neighbors were cooperating by keeping their dogs on leashes during evening walks.
definitions.example_cn: 邻居们在晚间遛狗时都自觉牵着狗绳，彼此配合。

comparison.analysis: “Collaborating” (协作) 通常指更深入、更紧密、常为长期或专业性的合作，强调共同创造或共同承担责任，如科学家合作发表论文。而 “cooperating” 更侧重于基本的配合与协调，可能不涉及深度共创，甚至可以是临时性或被动性的配合。
“Assisting” (协助) 指提供支持或帮助，但通常是一方主导、另一方辅助，权力或责任不对等。而 “cooperating” 强调双方或多方的平等参与和相互配合，目标是共同达成结果。
“Complying” (遵从) 强调服从规则、命令或要求，常带有被动或强制色彩，如遵守法律。而 “cooperating” 更积极，隐含自愿参与和主动配合的意愿，即使在没有强制的情况下也愿意配合。
